summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4505 for the improvement of alley in Block 2, Dow & Tomlin's University Addition, and between Block 2, The University Addition, and Block 3, Supplemental Plat of McGuire and Holden's Addition to Latona, being the alley between 8th Avenue Northeast and 9th Avenue Northeast, from East 45th Street to East 47th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52832, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
